questions.question: Confirm the equipment with below provided image of the equipment
upload the image of the equipment, contact the technical team for recorrections and scan the bar code again
check and confirm is there any physical damage of the equipment
prepare the Incident/Damage and Missing report.
connect the equipment to the mains, ON power switch and confirm whether the equipment is getting ON.
check and confirm whether the wall outlet is provided with AC Voltage of 230.
shift the equipment to another place where the AC voltage of 230 is available
check the continuity of power cord and confirm whether the power cord is defective
replace the power cord with a new one
check whether the Fuse is blown
replace the fuse with a new one
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the input voltage 230 AC is available at the Power supply board
check for any breakage or carbon formation of power input pin connector
replace the power input pin connector with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the pin connector

questions.question: open the equipment as shown in the video, check for any loose connection or breakage of cable from power input connector to power supply
replace or reseat the cables accordingly
replace the switch with a new one
If yes, check and confirm whether the output voltage is available at Power supply board

videos.videoName: Video for checking the O/P of SMPS

questions.question: repair/replace the SMPS accordingly
replace the control board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether the intensity of lamp is low
open the equipment as shown, check and confirm for any dirt or dust on the lamp.
clean the lamp with a soft tissue, replace back the lamp
replace the lamp with a new one

videos.videoName: Video required for replacing the lamp

questions.question: check and confirm whether the lamp does not glow.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check whether the voltage to the lamp is available.
replace the lamp with a new one
check for any loose connection between lamp and servo motor board.
reseat the cables properly
repair/replace the board accordingly
check and confirm whether there is no liquid into the flow cell.
check for any blockage or breakage of tube from motor to the flow cell.
clean or replace the tube with a new one
check and confirm whether unable to print the reports.
check and confirm whether the paper roll is inserted and properly placed.
place the paper roll properly
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for loose connections or breakage of cable from control board to printer board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
replace the printer board with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace the control board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm equipment is getting ON but display is blank.
open the equipment as shown in the video, check for loose connection or breakage of cable between the display to control board.
reseat or replace the cable accordingly
replace the display with a new one and confirm whether the problem still persist.
replace the control board with a new one

videos.videoName: Video for replacing the control board

questions.question: check and confirm whether there is no aspiration of sample or improper aspiration of sample.
check for any blockage or breakage or loose connection of tubing
replace or reseat the tubing properly
If the problem is not yet solved, contact the Technical Team for any other assistance through video call.
Thanks
